name: Dark Youtube
description: Dark Youtube skin for browsing Youtube, the emphasis being on low-light and those who are sensitive to light.  Also has a bit of a quality in that it removes desaturating bright whiteness.
additional_info:
<dl>
<dt>2011-11-14</dt>
<dd>Fixed some colour issues from past modifications, hopefully they'll look much better than before.</dd>
<dt>2011-12-02</dt>
<dd>Updated to work with the new Youtube skin at this time.</dd>
<dt>2012-05-02</dt>
<dd>Completely rewrote the CSS</dd>
<dd>Recolors the progress bar on Youtube videos</dd>
<dt>2013-05-29</dt>
<dd>Slight update, nothing big to speak of</dd>
<dt>2014-12-05</dt>
<dd>Removed majority of code that broke the video controls, now only skins video pages (ignores the comments section)</dd>
<dt>2015-01-09</dt>
<dd>Begun some updates and clean-up (as well as began prep for options in the user style)</dd>
<dt>2015-08-17</dt>
<dd>Massive rewrite to the styles, cleaned up problems, fixed the damn player again.</dd>
<dt>2015-08-17</dt>
<dd>Fixed the subscriptions menu.</dd>
</dl>
css:
@-moz-document domain("youtube.com") {
body,
#page,
#theater-background {background: #000; background-color: #000 !important}

p,
span,
strong,
b,
i {color: #fff !important}

a,
#watch-header .yt-user-info a {color: #ff7 !important; background: #444;}

h1,
h2,
h3,
h4,
h5,
h6,
.watch-view-count {color: #999 !important}

#yt-masthead-user,
#yt-masthead,
#yt-masthead-container, .yt-ui-ellipsis
 {background-color: #444 !important; color: #fff !important}

.kv8eNc.Mb,
#watch-header,
#watch7-sidebar-contents,
#action-panel-details,
#watch-discussion {background-color: #444 !important; color: #fff !important}

.yt-card {background: #444 !important;}

#appbar-guide-menu,
.guide-flyout {background: #444 !important;}

.all-comments,
.all-comments a,
#yt-comments-sb-standin .box,
span.yt-uix-button-content  { background: #000 !important; }

.yt-uix-button-subscribed-branded,
.yt-uix-button-default,
.yt-ui-menu-item,
.yt-ui-menu-content,
.yt-dialog-fg,
.yt-uix-overlay-actions,
.yt-uix-button-primary,
.comments .paginator{ background: #555 !important; color:#aaa; }

.overlay-confirmation-preferences-dialog .overlay-confirmation-delivery-method {color: #bbb;}

input,
body #footer-container,
.footer-container,
#masthead-appbar,
.account-container,
.social-connector,
.yt-uix-form-input-select,
.howto-promo-container,
#masthead-container,
.yt-tile-static, .yt-tile-visible, .yt-tile-default:hover,
select,
.yt-form-input-select-container,
.yt-uix-button-menu {background: #000 !important; color: #ff7 !important; }
}
